dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3058462I] DMCA Imfrigement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, February 12, 2007 11:04 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3058462I] DMCA Imfrigement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA Imfrigement Added by system at Tuesday, Feb 13 2007 05:03 am X-MailFrom: jon@forexfighter.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Feb 13 05:03:14 2007 Received: (qmail 32203 invoked by alias); 13 Feb 2007 11:03:14 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 32200 invoked from network); 13 Feb 2007 11:03:14 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 13 Feb 2007 11:03:14 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 13 Feb 2007 05:03:14 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 13 Feb 2007 05:03:14 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from jon@forexfighter.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HGvRJ-0003sz-TZ for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 13 Feb 2007 05:03:13 -0600 Received: from smtp2.cogeco.ca ([216.221.81.29] helo=fep3.cogeco.net) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from jon@forexfighter.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HGvR5-000PQq-Hq for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 13 Feb 2007 05:02:59 -0600 Received: from jonshuttle (149-152.mg.cgocable.ca [24.226.149.152]) by fep3.cogeco.net (Postfix) with ESMTP id 004C028622 for ; Tue, 13 Feb 2007 06:02:56 -0500 (EST) Reply-To: From: "Jon" To: Cc: References: <11974751.1171295226356.JavaMail.sfdc@eu0-app3-1-sjl.ops.sfdc.net> Subject: DMCA Imfrigement Date: Tue, 13 Feb 2007 21:32:49 +1030 Message-ID: <004301c74f5e$80de7050$6501a8c0@jonshuttle> X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 thread-index: AcdOvoLir1smNY5pTMGIKCkdYHP4LgAjnPJA In-Reply-To: <11974751.1171295226356.JavaMail.sfdc@eu0-app3-1-sjl.ops.sfdc.net> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----MTnoyriaszutfdxupwrhcqhwehoyeegeom" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Feb 2007 11:03:14.0401 (UTC) FILETIME=[8EC2F510:01C74F5E] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern, I am writing you today as I believe a website which has infringed on my website copyright material is being hosted with your company and request that the site be taken down. Here are the details about this infringement: My name is Jon Provencher and I have a website called ForexFighter located at: www.forexfighter.com which I have personally created in January 2006 using photoshop and dreamweaver (I have all the files to prove this). I have also created all the text for the website. The website has been online since then and has been archived at various location including search engines. I have done business with various other companies since early 2006 which can confirm this. I have discovered yesterday that a website called ForexFormulas at: www.forexformulas.com which was registered in December 2006 has copied the content of my website almost entirely including copyright images and text. This of course was done without my consent and was in no way authorized by my company and therefore is infringing on my copyrights. Here are the details I have been able to obtain from various sources about the owner of this infringing website: He usually represents himself as: Robert Hammond email: robert@forexformulas.com phone: 011-507-263-2178 company: forexformulas.com A whois returned the following information: Domain Name: FOREXFORMULAS.COM Registrar: ENOM, INC. Whois Server: whois.enom.com Referral URL: http://www.enom.com Name Server: NS131.HOSTGATOR.COM Name Server: NS132.HOSTGATOR.COM Status: ok Updated Date: 14-dec-2006 Creation Date: 14-dec-2006 Expiration Date: 14-dec-2007 Registrant Contact: RH enterprises George Steel (contact@skypestore.info) +1.6464349979 Fax: +1.5555555555 55105 - 109 Street miami, fl 33102 US Creation date: 14 Dec 2006 19:16:46 Expiration date: 14 Dec 2007 19:16:46 An IP Location search returned these information: Name: FOREXFORMULAS.COM Address: 70.87.94.34 Aliases: WWW.FOREXFORMULAS.COM I, Jon Provencher, owner of all the copyrights related to the website www.forexfighter.com demand that under the DMCA act of 1998 you remove or disable access to the website www.forexformulas.com as this was done without authorization by me, any representing agent or the law. Under penalty of perjury, I have authority to act in this Mather. Sincerely, Jon Provencher www.forexfighter.com jon@forexfighter.com MIME element (text/html) To whom it may concern,

I am writing you today as I believe a website which has infringed on my
website copyright material is being hosted with your company and request
that the site be taken down.

Here are the details about this infringement:
My name is Jon Provencher and I have a website called ForexFighter located
at: www.forexfighter.com which I have personally created in January 2006
using photoshop and dreamweaver (I have all the files to prove this). I have
also created all the text for the website. The website has been online since
then and has been archived at various location including search engines. I
have done business with various other companies since early 2006 which can
confirm this.

I have discovered yesterday that a website called ForexFormulas at:
www.forexformulas.com which was registered in December 2006 has copied the
content of my website almost entirely including copyright images and text.
This of course was done without my consent and was in no way authorized by
my company and therefore is infringing on my copyrights.

Here are the details I have been able to obtain from various sources about
the owner of this infringing website:
He usually represents himself as:
Robert Hammond
email: robert@forexformulas.com
phone: 011-507-263-2178
company: forexformulas.com

A whois returned the following information:
Domain Name: FOREXFORMULAS.COM
   Registrar: ENOM, INC.
   Whois Server: whois.enom.com
   Referral URL: http://www.enom.com
   Name Server: NS131.HOSTGATOR.COM
   Name Server: NS132.HOSTGATOR.COM
   Status: ok

   Expiration Date: 14-dec-2007

An IP Location search returned these information:
Name:    FOREXFORMULAS.COM
Address:  70.87.94.34
Aliases:  WWW.FOREXFORMULAS.COM


I, Jon Provencher, owner of all the copyrights related to the website
www.forexfighter.com demand that under the DMCA act of 1998 you remove or
disable access to the website www.forexformulas.com as this was done without
authorization by me, any representing agent or the law. Under penalty of
perjury, I have authority to act in this Mather.

Sincerely,
Jon Provencher
www.forexfighter.com
jon@forexfighter.com


MSGTAG has notified the sender that this message has been read.
